name: Happy Yak Coconut Thai Soup
description: Loaded with rice noodles and chicken this coconut based Thai curry soup is warming, aromatic, and delicious.Ingredients: rice noodles, chicken broth powder (glucose solids, yeast extract, chicken meat, hydrolyzed soy protein, corn flour, sea salt, chicken fat, potato starch, onion powder, spices), textured soy proteins, coconut milk powder (dried coconut milk, tapioca maltodextrin, sodium caseinate), toasted slivered almonds, skimmed milk powder, toasted sesame seeds, dehydrated vegetables (carrot, potato, onion, celery, leek, red and green bell peppers),corn starch, spices, dried lemon zest, citric acid.May contain: nut, peanuts, egg, fish, sea food, mustard.
